attributes.comment:
The amount of increases in the fees for international adoption (which average
out to approx. 46%) seems to be extreme. How a fee can almost double (as in the
case of the N-600) seems to be an attempt to make up for short comings in other
areas. Why should people who are trying to make a better life for a child and
ultimately our country be finanacially punished? It also seems irresponsible to
make such a large jump in fees when it has taken so long for a review of the
fees to take place. This also places a punitive cost on those people who are
trying to make our society a better place.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
